mapper.select: select distinct A.sl_word as sl_word, A.tot as freqidx, dense_rank() over(order by tot desc) as frank, A.sdate from (select distinct sl_word, sdate, count(*) over(partition by sl_word) as tot from fill.used_sl where sdate >= date_add(now(), interval -2 day) order by tot desc) A;
mapper.insert: insert into fill.used_sl(sl_index, sl_word, sdate) values (#{sl_index}, #{sl_word}, curdate());
mapper.select: select sl_word, sl_index from fill.sl where sl_index=#{sl_index};
